title: How long does it take to be approved sending application to join pbe?
body: Wondering how long cuz it's been weeks since i sent one

replies.body:
*Hyperion3182* is absolutely correct here, PBE applications aren't accepted on a time basis. In general, we look for players that are really active and are a positive influence on the community. I definitely recommend checking out the [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) they linked.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Hello,

PBE applications are tricky because there are way more applicants than available spots. It's a matter of patience, luck, play style, absence of toxicity history etc. Please have a look at the FAQ:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#h1q5
